body.p: At the present term of the Henry Circuit Court an Indictment charging James Mitchell of Henry County with murder in shooting One Q. A. Smith with a pistol produsing his death. In the undersigned were the jurors who tried the cause at the present Term of the Henry Circuit Court and by our verdict found the Said James Mitchell quietly of man slaughter and find his confinement in the penitentiary of the State for Two years. We think there were facts and circumstances in the case (although not to be considered by the Jury) calling for Executive clemancy. We therefore ask your Excellency to pardon him.

April 13th 1864
John L Butch
B. Chilton
W.. F. Bryant
E M Baskett
J. M Forbis
Robert faquer
M Hardesty
